RESOURCE.NAME: KEA Keyphrase Extractor
RESOURCE.COMMENT: A Keyphrase Extractor by Eibe Frank.

PARAMETER.NAME: inputAS
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for input

PARAMETER.NAME: outputAS
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for output

PARAMETER.NAME: keyphraseAnnotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The type name of the annotations encoding key phrases

PARAMETER.NAME: minPhraseLength
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The minimum length for key phrases

PARAMETER.NAME: maxPhraseLength
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The maximum length for key phrases

PARAMETER.NAME: minNumOccur
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The minimum number of times a phrase needs to occur

PARAMETER.NAME: phrasesToExtract
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The number of phrases to be extracted in application mode

PARAMETER.NAME: trainingMode
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Set to true for training and false for application

RESOURCE.NAME: KEA Corpus Importer
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Imports a KEA-style corpus into GATE
